targets.expr: sum by (severity, alertname) (ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})

sort_desc(sum by (envId, componentName) (topk(5, sum by (envId, componentName) (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type))))) or sort_desc(sum by (envId, componentName) (label_replace(sum  (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type)) - sum (topk(5, sum by (envId, componentName) (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type)))),"componentName","Other","componentName",  "(.*)")) > 0)

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_active{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) + (count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_active{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or sum(count by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_processes_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_running{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$", componentClass="partition", envId=~"[[envId]]", severity="error"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_ipool_pending{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_ipool_quarantined{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId, alertname, severity) (ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="error"} or ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="error"})) * sum(count by (envId) ((otcs_sov_ipool_quarantined{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) > 0)) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_backlog{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_queued{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_processed{envId=~"[[envId]]"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (id, envId) (max_over_time(otcs_sov_ipool_pending{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$barInterval]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$barInterval]))) or vector(0)
sum(max by (id, envId) (max_over_time(otcs_sov_ipool_quarantined{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$barInterval]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[$barInterval]))) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_backlog{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_queued{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_processed{envId=~"[[envId]]"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_original_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_original_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) - 
count(ALERTS{alertname=~"otac_archive_no_pools",envId=~"[[envId]]",componentClass=~"otac_archive_original",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"otac_archive_no_pools",envId=~"[[envId]]",componentClass=~"otac_archive_original",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"otac_archive_no_pools",envId=~"[[envId]]",componentClass=~"otac_archive_original",severity="error"}) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_replicated_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_replicated_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_external_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_external_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from environment
list.label: Environment
list.name: envId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from environment

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system
list.label: System
list.name: systemId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system
